full_output.summary: Motivated Human Resources Professional with a drive for serving as a dedicated support specialist and energetic team member. Adept in assisting with the recruitment of employees, as well as the management of existing employees. Experienced in managing employee and community outreach programs and dedicated to working towards the mission of a company. Accomplished professional with strong understanding of payroll procedures, tax regulations and benefits administration. Proficient in using multiple payroll software programs with knack for quickly learning new systems. Highly organized, detail-oriented, and efficient at work.

experiences.description: Managed payroll to ensure accurate and timely payment of salaries and benefits. Generated payroll reports that provided detailed insights into payroll trends, allowing for informed decision-making. Calculating each employee's income including overtime and bonuses. Dealing with large-scale databases and communicating with various departments, i.e. Answering questions. Liaising with management to gain approval for certain payments. Updating staff members' records and payment grades. Prepare pay orders through an electronic system. Manage the outgoing employee and business taxes. Working out PF amount of each employee and creating a challan in PF website. Employee KYC approval details, director or authorised signatory KYC. Filling out employee exit details. Working out tax calculations based on the regime opted and collecting declarations and proof of submission from employees and rework the Income tax based on the documents. Well versed with Greythr software, Keka software, Razor pay software. Filed TDS returns and TCS returns and corrections to the TDS statements, checking validity of lower deduction certificate. Requesting form 16,16A, 27D. Compliance related to Labour Welfare Fund. Well-versed with Winman and Keka software for TDS. Worked out ESI Calculations and challan generation and payment. Responding various department notices such as TDS, PF and ESIC. Filed form U return under shops and establishment.

Performed reconciliations between general ledger, bank accounts, and credit card accounts to ensure accuracy of financial information. Developed and implemented internal controls to ensure accuracy and integrity of financial data. Reconciled financial accounts and identified discrepancies, resulting in improved accuracy of financial statements. Generated weekly, monthly, and annual financial reports for management. Handled accounts payable and accounts receivable, resulting in improved cash flow and reduced overdue payments. Prepared monthly, quarterly and annual financial statements in accordance with Generally Accepted Accounting Principles (GAAP). Prepared and filed multiple tax returns on time and in compliance with applicable laws. Preparing TDS working, TDS payment within due date, and Quarterly E- return filing. Preparing monthly GSTR 1, GSTR 2A Reconciliation, and GSTR 3 working and GST payments within the due date. Preparing monthly ESI, PF, and Professional Tax working and initiating payment within the due date. As per HR inputs preparing monthly payroll. Comparison of payroll statement with previous payment. Issuance of pay slips and exit employee data. Income tax declaration, computation, and employee investment proof verification. Individual income tax filing and calculating advance tax computation and 15CA CB filling for foreign remittance.
Prepared E-way bill and filed GST returns. Accounting Sales & purchases in tally. Did Bank Reconciliation in Tally.

skills: Ability to Work in a Team
